title: When Can I play Reworked Rengar.
body:
Guys its 9:37am and i still cant play rengar (reworked), and when can i play ranked again so i get a better rank. Like that 10 match thingy.....
THANKS!!!

replies.body:
Like BananaSlayer said, new patch comes out tomorrow which will be when you can play new rangar. 

As for the new season, that starts on the 7th of December. This is when you can play a 10game placement series and get a new rank. That being said, **you are going to be placed lower** than you ended this season. the beginning of a season starts with a soft MMR reset, where it goes down a couple of notches from where it currently is. In the past, even players with 50+% win rates that go 10/10 in placements generally get placed lower.

Patch 6.22 comes out tomorrow at around 6:00 pm AEST, which is when you can play the new Rengar: 
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

I think you should be able to play ranked when the 2017 Season begins on December 6:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017
relax man you will wave to wait until the new patch comes out
